DOC.brief_summary: To estimate effect food oxycodone pharmacokinetics administration 40 mg dos PF-00345439 Formulation K estimate relative bioavailability compare PF-00345439 Formulation X fast state healthy volunteer
DOC.brief_title: Food Effect And Relative Bioavailability Study Of Oxycodone Healthy Volunteers
DOC.detailed_description: This study estimate effect food ( standard high-fat breakfast ) pharmacokineticsand relative bioavailability oxycodone follow oral administration single 40 mg dos PF-00345439 Formulation K healthy volunteer . Additionally , study estimate pharmacokinetics relative bioavailability oxycodone follow oral administration single 40 mg dos test PF-00345439 Formulation K compare reference PF-00345439 Formulation X fast condition healthy volunteer assess single-dose safety tolerability oxycodone PF-00345439 formulation healthy volunteer administer naltrexone block .
DOC.criteria: Healthy male and/or female subject 18 55 year age ( inclusive ) . Evidence history clinically significant disease Positive urine drug test
